title: Historic Five-Star Elegance near Munich with Michelin-Star Restaurant
description:
Embrace historic elegance at Hotel Maximilian's, a five-star sanctuary in the heart of Greater Munich's charming Augsburg. Nobly housed in an 18th-century framework, this characterful abode, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, has seen its share of celebrity guests including Mozart, Emperor Napoleon I and Czar Nicholas I.

Reimagined into a luxuriously modern escape, the hotel is home to a classic bar serving carefully curated cocktails and an exceptional Michelin-star restaurant. Set on the town's charming main street, surrounded by cobblestone thoroughfares concealing colourful Renaissance and Rococo buildings, Hotel Maximilian's is perfectly located for discovering one of Germany’s oldest cities, with Munich around a 35-minute train journey away.
